translation:
Most Illustrious Sir

I acknowledge receipt of your letter dated the 11th of the current month, and of the responses from Your Lordship D. Ana Joaquina da Silva Santos, D. Guiomar Maria Soares, Júlio César Centeno, and Joaquim Vieira Braga, which accompanied it, and which I shall present to the Excellency.

May God preserve Your Lordship  
Secretary of the Treasury in Piratini, August 25, 1838.  
(a) Domingos José de Almeida.

Most Illustrious Sir Inácio José de Oliveira Guimarães, Chief of Police of the Boqueirão Department.  
From the Ministry of the Treasury.  
Letter received on the 30th of the same month.
